SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Work Productivity and Activity Impairment Questionnaire - Specific Health Problem V2.0 - Are you currently employed (working for pay)?

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: WPAI01-Missed Work Hours Due to Problem
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Work Productivity and Activity Impairment Questionnaire - Specific Health Problem V2.0 - During the past seven days, how many hours did you miss from work because of problems associated with your problem?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WPAI:SHP v2.0 - Missed Work Hours Due to Problem

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: WPAI01-Missed Work Hours Due to Other
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Work Productivity and Activity Impairment Questionnaire - Specific Health Problem V2.0 - During the past seven days, how many hours did you miss from work because of any other reason, such as vacation, holidays, time off to participate in this study?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WPAI:SHP v2.0 - Missed Work Hours Due to Other Reasons

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Work Productivity and Activity Impairment Questionnaire - Specific Health Problem V2.0 - During the past seven days, how many hours did you actually work?
Work Productivity and Activity Impairment Questionnaire - Specific Health Problem V2.0 - During the past seven days, how much did your problem affect your productivity while you were working?

Work Productivity and Activity Impairment Questionnaire - Specific Health Problem V2.0 - During the past seven days, how much did your problem affect your ability to do your regular daily activities, other than work at a job?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WPAI:SHP v2.0 - Problem Affects Regular Daily Activity

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Work Productivity and Activity Impairment Questionnaire - Specific Health Problem V2.0 - Absenteeism score.
Work Productivity and Activity Impairment Questionnaire - Specific Health Problem V2.0 - Presenteeism score.
Work Productivity and Activity Impairment Questionnaire - Specific Health Problem V2.0 - Work productivity loss score.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WPAI:SHP v2.0 - Work Productivity Loss Score

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Work Productivity and Activity Impairment Questionnaire - Specific Health Problem V2.0 - Activity impairment score.
